name: JUMPJETS
effect: This character can fly with its Standard Movement and Boosts, but takes 1 heat at the end of its turn if it flew this way.

name: BARREL ROLL
effect: This character performs a barrel roll, flying 6 spaces in any direction and causing the attack to miss. This movement ignores engagement and does not provoke reactions. This system gains one charge whenever this character reloads all weapons.
trigger: A melee or ranged attack hits this character, and it is not Slowed or Immobilized.

name: BOMBING BAY
effect: If this unit is flying when they Move or Boost, they may drop a bomb on one space below or adjacent to the path taken, creating a Blast 1 explosion. Characters within the affected area must succeed on an Agility save or take 6 Explosive damage and be knocked Prone. This system gains one charge whenever this character reloads all weapons.

name: STRAFE
effect: 1/round this unit can fly spaces equal to Speed in any direction, automatically dealing 3 Kinetic damage to one character below or adjacent to the path taken.

name: MISSILE SWARM
effect: This weapon deals double damage to characters with Lock On (including if this weapon's attack consumes Lock On) and doesn’t affect allied characters.

name: RAPID RESPONSE
effect: This character may Boost.
trigger: An enemy character in line of sight moves.

name: CHAFF LAUNCHERS
effect: After using Barrel Roll, this character counts as being in soft cover until the end of their next turn; additionally, Barrel Roll can be used against tech attacks and may ignore its restrictions on Slowed and Immobilized against the tech attack, but only prevents the attack and provides soft cover and does not provide movement.

name: LIGHT LASER
effect: This weapon deals double damage to characters with this character's Defense Net.

name: DEFENSE NET
effect: This character projects a Burst 3 shield that provides soft cover to all characters, including this character, within its area and hard cover in all directions to other characters adjacent to this unit. Additonally, all characters within the Defense Net, including this character, cannot be critically hit.

name: RESTORATION PULSE
effect: All characters within this character's defense net clear Impaired and Slowed.

name: REGENERATIVE SHIELDING
effect: This character has Immunity to Impaired and Slowed.

name: ADAPTIVE SHIELDING
trigger: An ally within this character's Defense Net takes damage.
effect: All allies within the Defense Net gain Resistance to the damage type take until the end of this character's next turn or until they leave the Defense Net. If multiple damage types are taken, choose one as the triggering type.

name: RING OF FIRE
effect: Any hostile character that ends their turn inside the area affected by Defense Net take 2 heat and become Shredded until they leave the area.

name: HARDLIGHT COVER SYSTEM
effect: As a quick action, this character deploys a Line 3 obstruction 3 spaces high in any location within Sensors and at least partially within this character's Line of Sight. The wall is immune to damage and effects, blocks line of sight, and grants hard cover. Characters adjacent to this wall gain Resistance to damage from Line, Blast, Burst, and Cone attacks. All Hardlight Covers dissipate at the end of the scene or when this character is destroyed.

name: HA BLACKWALL SYSTEM
effect: As a full action, the Aegis generates a pitch-black wall of blinkspace 5 spaces high covering a line10 area starting within range 5. All spaces must be free. The wall blocks line of sight, effects or attacks and provides hard cover. Characters that start their turn in the wall or who enter it on their turn roll 1d6. On a 4+ they are removed from play until the end of their next turn, when they reappear in a free space of their choice in Range 10 of the wall. If there are no free spaces, they return when a space becomes free. The wall lasts until the Aegis ends it as a quick action, or is destroyed. When it ends, characters remaining in blinkspace reappear.

name: SUPPRESS
effect: This character chooses a target within line of sight and Range 10: they become Impaired and this character gains the Moving Target reaction. This effect lasts until this character uses Moving Target, this character takes any damage, the target leaves this character's range or line of sight, or this character ends it as a free action. This character may only have one target suppressed at a time.

name: MOVING TARGET
effect: This character immediately attacks the target with a single weapon.
trigger: A character supressed by this character begins a movement.

name: SUPERIOR SENTINEL
effect: This character gains +1 ACC and Reliable 3 on all weapon attacks made as reactions.

name: BLINDING SHELLS
effect: 1/round, after this character makes a successful weapon attack, their target must make an Engineering save. On a failure, the target only has line of sight to adjacent spaces until the end of their next turn.

name: CALLED SHOT
effect: This character declares an action that it has flawlessly predicted. If the target takes the called action this turn, this character may immediately interrupt the action with a weapon attack as a reaction that ignores the normal limitation on number of reactions per turn.
trigger: A character within line of sight and Range 10 starts their turn.

name: COVERING FIRE
effect: This character chooses a Blast 3 area within line of and Range 10 and gains the Got Your Back reaction. This zone lasts until the end of this character's next turn. This system gains one charge whenever this character reloads all weapons.

name: GOT YOUR BACK
effect: This character makes a single weapon attack against the target.
trigger: An enemy within the Blast 3 created by Covering Fire makes an attack.

name: HAIL OF FIRE
effect: This character chooses another character within Range 10: they become Immobilized and Impaired until the end of their next turn, until this character is Stunned or Jammed, until this character loses line of sight to them, or until the target allows this character to attack them with a single weapon as a reaction.

name: KAI BIOPLATING
effect: The Assassin gains +1 Accuracy on all Agility checks; additionally, they climb and swim at normal speed, ignore difficult terrain, and, when making a standard move, can jump horizontally up to their Speed and vertically up to half their Speed (in any combination).

name: HEATED BLADE
effect: Deals double damage to Prone, Shredded, Immobilized, or Stunned targets.

name: ASSASSIN’S MARK
effect:
The Assassin chooses a character in line of sight. For the rest of the scene, these effects apply:
  • It has Resistance to that target’s damage.
  • Damage it deals to that target cannot be reduced.
  • It gains +1 Accuracy on all saves forced by that target.

The Assassin can only choose a new target if the current target is destroyed.

name: LEAP
effect: The Assassin flies 6 spaces in any direction but must land on a surface. When they land, characters adjacent to the Assassin must succeed on an Agility save or be knocked Prone.

name: SAP
effect: The Assassin chooses a character next to them: they must succeed on an Engineering save or be Stunned until the end of their next turn.

name: SPINNING KICK
effect: The Assassin chooses a character next to them: they must pass a Hull save or be pushed 4 spaces away from the Assassin and knocked Prone.

name: CLOUD PROJECTOR
effect: The Assassin sets off a charge, creating a Burst 3 area of smoke, haze, or some other kind of concealing shroud. The Assassin gains soft cover within the affected area, and characters other than the Assassin fully inside or outside the area cannot draw line of sight into or out of the area. Characters partially within the area are not affected. This effect lasts until the end of the Assassin’s next turn, or until the Assassin uses this system again.

name: EXPLOSIVE KNIVES
effect: The Assassin expends a charge to throw an Explosive damage knife at a character within range 3, making a ranged attack at +{2/4/6}. On a hit, the knife embeds itself in the target and explodes at the end of their next turn, dealing {6/8/10} Explosive damage in a Burst 1 area.

name: HUNKER DOWN
effect: Gain Resistance to all damage from the attack. This character is knocked Prone.
trigger: A melee or ranged attack hits this character.

name: MICRO-MISSILE BARRAGE
effect: This character launches a Line 8 volley of micro-missiles. All characters within the affected area must succeed on a Hull save or take 6 Kinetic damage. On a successful save, they take half damage. This system regains one charge when this character reloads all weapons.

name: HIGH-IMPACT ROUNDS
effect: Mod, These high-caliber rounds can only be used with the Heavy Assault Rifle. When firing with these rounds, this character's attacks become AP and deal +4 bonus Kinetic damage, but the Heavy Assault Rifle must be reloaded before it is used again (as though it was Loading).

name: AUTO-TARGETING
effect: This character ignores cover when attacking, although they still require line of sight.

name: RANK DISCIPLINE
effect: This character gains +1 ACC on all attacks, checks, and saves while adjacent to at least one allied character with the Mech tag.

name: GRAVITON LANCE
on_hit: Target is Slowed until the end of their next turn.

name: MOBILE PRINTER
effect: This character prints a Size 2 object in a free and adjacent area. The object blocks line of sight, provides hard cover, and has 20 HP and 5 Evasion.

name: SHOCK PLATING
effect: This character has Resistance to kinetic damage.

name: BULWARK MODS
effect: This character ignores difficult terrain and dangerous terrain.

name: TOTAL STRENGTH SUITE
effect: This character may pick up and throw an adjacent Size 2 or smaller object to a free space within Range 5 and line of sight. Any characters adjacent to the object after it is thrown must pass an Agility saving throw or take 4 Kinetic damage and be knocked back 1 space.

name: DRAG DOWN
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a success, they take 2 heat per space they voluntarily move until the end of their next turn, up to 8 total heat.

name: SEISMIC REPULSOR
effect: All non-flying characters within a Burst 3 must pass a Hull save or be knocked 3 spaces back from this character and knocked Prone. The affected area becomes difficult terrain for the rest of the scene.

name: EXTRUDITE
effect: This character may print two separate objects at a time with Mobile Printer.

name: HUNGER/PURSUIT LIMPETS
effect: Quick Action, Limited 1, The character rapidly prints and deploys a field of tiny, mobile mines in a Blast 2 area that includes them. The affected area becomes difficult terrain; additionally, hostile characters that start their turn in the area or enter it for the first time in a round must succeed on a Systems save or be Slowed until the end of their next turn.

name: TITAN-SNARE DRONE
effect: Size 1/2, HP 5, Evasion 10, E-def 10, This drone can be printed and deployed to any free adjacent space. Whenever a hostile character ends a movement or starts their turn within range 3 of the drone, it emits a pulse, and they become Immobilized until the drone is destroyed; while any character is Immobilized this way, the Titan-Snare drone cannot be moved by any means. This system deactivates if this character is destroyed.

name: ENTRENCHED
effect: This character is immune to knockback, push, pull, and Prone inflicted by smaller characters. Additionally, this character has Resistance to all damage originating from characters beyond range 3.

name: GUARDIAN
effect: Allied characters can use this character for hard cover.

name: MODERATOR.BLOK
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a target within Sensors. On a hit, the target takes 2 heat each time they make an attack until the end of their next turn.

name: NEAR-THREAT DENIAL SYSTEM
effect: When a character within range 3 attacks an allied character of this character, they take 2 AP Explosive damage before rolling.

name: SIEGE GUARDIAN
effect: Allied characters gain Resistance to damage from Blast, Burst, Line, and Cone attacks while they're adjacent to this character.

name: POWER KNUCKLE
effect: A character within range 2 must pass a Hull save or take 4 Kinetic damage, be pushed 5 spaces directly away from this character, and be knocked Prone.

name: FEARLESS DEFENDER
effect: Effect: This character can move to an adjacent space and take the damage instead before the target's armor or resistance is applied.
trigger: An allied character within range 5 of this character takes damage, and this character isn't Slowed, Immobilized, Stunned, or otherwise cannot move.

name: CRUSHING EMBRACE
effect: A character adjacent to this character must succeed on an Agility save or automatically be grappled by this character and become Jammed until they are no longer grappled. This character can only grapply one character this way at a time.

name: RETRIBUTION
effect: Whenever this character takes damage from a hostile source, their next attack deals +2 bonus damage. This damage stacks up to +8. Bonuses are lost when this character attacks or at the end of their turn.

name: BOLSTERED SIEGE ARMOR
effect: This character has +3 armor against ranged attacks originating beyond range 3.

name: CHAIN AXE
effect: On critical hit: Target becomes Shredded until the end of their next turn.

name: STAMPEDE DEFENSE
effect: This character has resistance to all damage unless they are Impaired, Stunned, Immobilized, Shredded, Slowed, or Exposed.

name: AGGRESSION
effect: This character attacks a random adjacent character with the Chain Axe. This character always takes this reaction if able, even if there are no valid targets.
trigger: This character takes any damage.

name: AVALANCHE CHARGE
effect: This character moves spaces equal to their Speed in a straight line, ignoring reactions and engagement, then attacks a random adjacent character with the Chain Axe.

name: JUGGERNAUT
effect: When this character uses Avalanche Charge, all characters adjacent to the path they follow or adjacent to their final position must succeed on a Hull save or be knocked Prone.

name: HARPOON CANNON
on_hit: Targets of smaller or equal Size to this character are pulled adjacent to them in a straight line, or as close as possible. If they're larger, this character is pulled adjacent to them instead. If the target ends their movement adjacent, this character automatically Grapples them.

name: NAIL GUN
on_hit: Target rolls an Agility save. On a failure, they are Immobilized until the end of their next turn.

name: SUPERHOT
effect: This character gains Resistance to the attack's damage, and the attacker must succeed on an Engineering save or take 2 Burn.
trigger: This characer takes damage from a melee attack.

name: ACTIVE BOMBARDMENT
effect: After attacking with the Bombard Cannon, this character continues to barrage the targeted area with additional shelling until the end of their next turn. Characters that enter the area for the first time in a round or end their turn there take 4 Explosive damage. Additionally, characters within the area take double damage from this character's Bombard cannon.

name: EARTHSHAKER SHELLS
effect: After attacking with the Bombard Cannon, this character may also fire a special earthshaker shell. In addition to the attack, characters within Burst 3 of the targeted space must succeed on a Hull save or be knocked Prone. Debris or broken earth is thrown up by the impact, creating two Size 1 segments of hard cover in free spaces of this character's choice within the Burst 3.

name: REACTIVE PLATING
effect: When this character is hit by a ranged or melee attack, it gains 1 mark of Expended Plating that can be tracked with a d6. If the attack was a ranged attack, this character rolls a d6: if the result is greater than or equal to the number of marks, it has resistance to all damage from the attack.

name: HIGH-IMPACT SHELLS
effect: On a hit, the Bombard Cannon knocks targets 3 spaces away from this character.

name: BUNKER BUSTER
effect: The Bombard Cannon automatically deals 10 AP Explosive damage to objects and terrain in the affected area.

name: RUINED EARTH
effect: The Bombard Cannon's Blast becomes difficult terrain for the rest of the scene.

name: WAR CRIME SHELLS
effect: The damage from Active Bombardment becomes Burn instead of Explosive.

name: TRAMPLE
effect: This character ignores engagement and can pass through - but not stop in - spaces occupied by other characters. When this character moves through another character's space, that character takes 2 kinetic damage; a character cannot be damaged this way more than once per turn.

name: IMPALE
effect: This character moves up to 8 spaces in a straight line. Pick a character that this character passed through or ended adjacent to: they make a Hull save at +1 DIFF. On a failure, they are pulled with the Cataphract to the end of their movement and grappled.

name: POINT-DEFENSE SHIELD
effect: This character has Resistance to all damage from the closest hostile character. If multiple characters are equally close, this effect does not apply.

name: ELECTRIFIED LASSO
effect: A character within line of sight and range 5 must make a Hull save. On a failure, they are pulled as close as possible to this character; if they adjacent after this pull, the Cataphract automatically grapples them.

name: HOOVES
effect: Characters that take damage from Trample are Impaired until the end of their next turn.

name: ELECTRIFIED BOLA
effect: A flying character in Range 10 must succeed on an Agility save. On a failure, they land immediately and become Immobilized until the end of their next turn. This counts as falling without damage.

name: CAPACITOR DISCHARGE
effect: Shield, As long as this character isn't Slowed or Immobilized, they gain Resistance to Energy damage and heat, and at the end of this character's turn, all adjacent characters take 2 Heat.

name: CHARGE
effect: This character moves spaces equal to its Speed in a straight line, ignoring reactions and engagement, then attacks a target within Range with the Ram Cannon.

name: DEMOLITION HAMMER
on_hit: Targets must succeed on a Hull save or be Stunned until the end of their next turn.

name: DIG IN
effect: This character gains Resistance to all damage from the attack, but becomes Slowed until the end of its next turn.
trigger: An attack hits this character, and it is not Immobilized or Slowed

name: DUELING ARMOR
effect: This character has Resistance to damage from melee weapons.

name: HEAVY FRAME
effect: This character can't be pushed, pulled, knocked Prone, or knocked back by smaller characters.

name: COLLATERAL DAMAGE
effect: When this character makes a melee attack, they may deal 10 kinetic damage to an object or deployable adjacent to their target.

name: BROAD-SWEEP HAFT
effect: This character swings the Demolition Hammer in a Burst 2 sweep instead of attacking normally. This character attacks all characters of their choice within the area with the Demolition Hammer, but on hit targets instead take 4 AP Explosive damage and become Impaired until the end of their next turn.

name: KINETIC COMPENSATION
effect: Each time this character misses with the Demolition Hammer, they gain +1 ACC on all subsequent attacks with it until their next hit. This Accuracy can be gained multiple times and stacks.

name: CONCUSSION MISSILES
effect: All characters of this character's choice within line of sight and Range 5 must succeed on a Hull save or become Slowed and Impaired until the end of their next turn.

name: BREACH RAM
effect: This character moves up to 6 spaces in a straight line, ignoring engagement and passing through - but not stopping in - spaces occupied by other characters. Objects in this character's path take 20 AP Kinetic damage. This character passes through any obstructions destroyed this way and continues moving until they have moved 6 spaces or fail to destroy an obstruction sufficient to stop them. Any characters in this character's path must succeed on an Agility save or be pushed out of the way as directly as possible and knocked Prone.

name: SUPERIOR RAM
effect: When using Breach Ram this character moves 4 more spaces, and targets have +1 DIFF on the Agility save.

name: FOLLOWER COUNT
effect: Quick Tech, +1 ACC, This character makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a success, this character gains +1 ACC on all attacks against their target, and may Boost once per turn as a free action, so long as it moves them directly towards the target. This lasts until either character is destroyed and cannot be changed to a new target.

name: THERMAL CHARGE
effect: This character may expend a charge to throw a grenade to create a Blast 2 within Range 5. Characters in the area must succeed on an Agility save or take 2 burn, half on a success. Objects, terrain, and deployables automatically take 10 AP Energy damage.

name: SENTRY TURRET
effect: Quick Action, Drone, Loading, Deployable, Sentry Turret (Size 1/2, HP 5, Evasion 10, E-Defense 10). This character constructs a turret in a free, adjacent space. At the end of each of this character's turns, deployed turrets attack the nearest hostile character within Range 10. They attack at +1 and deal 4 Kinetic damage. Each turret has Threat 3 and its own reaction that can only be used to overwatch. This character may have up to six turrets deployed at a time, all of which are disabled if this character is destroyed. This character regains one use of this system whenever they reload all weapons.

name: THAT ONE!
effect: A character within Line of Sight gains an Engineer's Mark until the end of this character's next turn. When a Sentry Turret attacks, it will attack the closest character with an Engineer's Mark instead of the closest hostile character; if no characters with an Engineer's Mark are within Range and Line of Sight, the turret instead attacks the closest hostile character normally. This trait automatically recharges when this character stabilizes.

name: WELL THERE'S YOUR PROBLEM
effect: When this character stabilizes, its adjacent Sentry Turrets gain 5 overshield.

name: POWER DEPLOYER
effect: This character can deploy two turrets at a time with Sentry Turret.

name: SKYSHIELD PROTOCOL
effect: Sentry Turrets gain +2 Accuracy against flying targets.

name: SHEPHERD FIELD
effect: Drones and objects adjacent to this character gain Resistance to all damage.

name: TURRET LEGGIES
effect: At the start of this character's turn, Sentry Turrets may move up to 3 spaces. This movement provokes reactions normally.

name: SELF-DESTRUCT SEQUENCE
effect: Sentry Turrets detonate in a Burst 1 area when either they or this character are destroyed. Characters within the are must succeed on an Agility save or take 7 Explosive damage.

name: INFERNO TURRETS
effect: Sentry Turrets may attack as a Cone 3 that deals 2 Burn instead of their normal attack.

name: HELLSTORM TURRETS
effect: Sentry Turrets may attack as a Range 15 Blast 1 that deals 2 Explosive damage instead of their normal attack.

name: SPRAY AND PRAY SENTRIES
effect: Sentry Turret attacks gain Reliable 1

name: HUNTER-KILLER NEXUS
on_hit: Target takes 1 Heat for each condition currently affecting them.

name: DRONE BARRAGE
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a success, the target chooses one: they become Immobilized and Impaired until the end of their next turn, or they immediately move up to 5 spaces in a direction chosen by this character. This movement is involuntary ignores engagement and does not provoke reactions.

name: RAZOR SWARMS
effect: This character deploys a Blast 1 razor swarm in a free area within Sensors. Allied characters gain soft cover as long as they are at least partially within the affected area. Hostile characters that start their turn in the area or move into it for the first time in a round take 2 Burn. This character can deploy any number of razor swarms, which persist until the end of the scene or until this character is destroyed. After using this system, this character regains 1 use of Shadow Swarms.

name: SHADOW SWARMS
effect: This character deploys a Burst 2 shadow swarm that lasts until the end of this character's next turn. Allied characters gain soft cover as long as they are at least partially within the affected area. Hostile characters are Slowed and Impaired as long as they are in the affected area. After using this system, this character regains 1 use of Razor Swarms.

name: ELECTRO-NANITE CLOUD
effect: At the start of their turn, hostile characters within Range 3 must make a Systems save or become Impaired until the end of their next turn, then take 1 burn per condition affecting them.

name: MOTILE SWARM
effect: As a protocol, this character may move any number of Razor Swarms and Shadow Swarms up to 2 spaces in any direction, including into spaces occupied by other characters and other Razor and Shadow Swarms.

name: CLINGING SWARMS
effect: Whenever characters take Burn from a Razor Swarm, they must succeed on a Systems save. If they fail, they become Impaired until the end of their next turn; if they are already Impaired, they are instead Slowed for the same duration.

name: GRIND MANIPLE
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a target within Sensors. On a hit, until the end of the target's next turn they take 1 Burn for each condition affecting them each time they take a Quick Action, Full Action, or Overcharge.

name: SEEKER CLOUD
effect: Characters damaged by this weapon gain Lock On.

name: STINGER PISTOL
on_hit: Targets become Impaired until the end of their next turn.

name: SSC TOTAL SUITE
effect: This character can hover whenever it moves or Boosts. It takes 1 heat at the end of its turn if it moved this way.

name: WEAVE
effect: Each round, the first attack made against this character as part of a reaction automatically misses.

name: IMPALE SYSTEMS
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors who is Impaired. On a hit, they take 3 Heat and become Jammed until the end of their next turn.

name: ADAPT/EVADE/DISENGAGE
effect: This character has Immunity to Grapple and always ignores engagement.

name: UMBRAL INTERDICTION
effect: The target must pass a Systems save or their attack automatically misses.
trigger: A character within Sensors and line of sight targets a character other than the Hornet with an attack.

name: EXILE
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a target within Sensors. On a hit, at the end of that character's next turn, they take 4 heat if they are within 3 spaces of one of their allied characters.

name: LOCK/HOLD JAVELINS
effect: This character fires a javelin at an Impaired character within range 5 and line of sight. The target must succeed on a Hull save or be impaled, becoming Immobilized and Shredded for the rest of the scene. These conditions can be cleared normally (stabilizing, etc.).

name: SCOURING WHIP
effect: This weapon gains Threat 3 and +1 ACC when used within a Shroud Zone.
on_hit: The target is pulled adjacent to this character, or as close as possible.

name: RIPPER CLAWS
effect: This weapon deals double damage when used within a Shroud Zone.

name: UMBRAL SHROUD
effect: At the start of combat, when they arrive as reinforcements, or 1/round as a Quick Action, this character can create a rippling storm of nanites - a Shroud Zone - in a free Blast 1 area within Range 5. Shroud Zones provide soft cover. Additionally, when this character enters a Shroud Zone, it becomes Invisible and gains Resistance to all damage and heat until it is no longer in a Shroud Zone. When a hostile character enters a Shroud Zone, they become Shredded and Impaired until they are no longer in a Shroud Zone. Shroud Zones can only be targeted by tech attacks and weapons that target E-Defense or have a Blast, Burst, Cone, or Line template. They have Evasion 12, E-Defense 6, and disperse upon any successful attack. This character cannot place another Shroud Zone if it has 3 or more Shroud Zones already active, but it may dismiss one or more Shroud Zones as a free action on its turn. Shroud Zones can overlap each other, but their effects do not stack.

name: UMBRAL SHIFT
effect: Quick Action, This character teleports to a Shroud Zone within line of sight.

name: CONSUME SHROUD
effect: This character consumes a Shroud Zone they are inside or adjacent to, clearing all conditions, gaining 4 Overshield, and then moving spaces equal to their Speed. They cannot consume a Shroud Zone they created in the same round.

name: DEFENSIVE SHROUD
effect: It creates a Shroud Zone centered on its location. It still may not generate more than 3 Shroud Zones.
trigger: This character takes damage or heat while they are not in a Shroud Zone.

name: DEVOURING SHARD
effect: While inside a Shroud Zone, this character can spew out a Cone 3 torrent of razor sharp nanites as a quick action. Characters within the affected area must pass an Engineering save or take 4 AP Energy damage. On a success, they take half damage.

name: EMPOWER SHROUD
effect: This character expands a Shroud Zone they currently occupy to Blast 2. This can cause it to envelop other characters. In addition, it now takes two successful attacks to disperse the effect.

name: ENSHROUD
effect: This character becomes Immobilized, Invisible, and Hidden, and does not lose Hidden when taking hostile actions. It may end these effects at any time on its turn as a Quick Action, but cannot clear Immobilized by any means until it does so.

name: DISPLACER BLUNDERBUS
effect: This weapon may only be fired while this character is under the effects of Enshroud.
on_hit: The target is pulled 2 spaces directly toward this character.

name: SKYSNATCHER
effect: This character's Displacer Blunderbus has Threat 5 against flying targets.

name: ABLATIVE SHROUD
effect: Enshroud immediately ends, and this character gains resistance to the triggering damage.
trigger: This character takes damage while under the effects of Enshroud.

name: SPOOKY SHIFT
effect: While this character is under the effects of Enshroud, it may teleport 3 spaces as a Protocol. This is treated as involuntary movement.

name: ABYSSAL GRASP
effect: When a hostile character is pulled adjacent to this character as the result of this character's Overwatch attack, that character loses all remaining movement, even if they would normally ignore engagement.

name: WARP SENSORS
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a target within Sensors. On a hit, the target takes 2 Heat and all attacks they make until the end of their next turn treat their targets as having hard cover.

name: REALITY FLICKER
effect: Instead of taking their standard movement, this character may teleport up to their speed in any direction.

name: DATAVEIL
effect: This character is Invisible and can transfer this status to another character within Sensors and line of sight as a quick action. When it does so, this character ceases to be Invisible, and only regains the status when they transfer it back as quick action or their target is destroyed. This effect lasts until this character is destroyed or until it is transferred to another character.

name: GLITCH SCANNERS
effect: This character's advanced electronic countermeasures play havoc with enemy systems, causing them to register false positives on the battlefield. They may target up to two characters within Sensors who are not Immobilized, Slowed, Jammed, or Stunned, allowing them to teleport up to 5 spaces in any direction, revealing their 'true' locations.

name: BLIP
effect: This character may allow one allied character within Sensors to teleport up to 5 spaces in any direction as a reaction.
trigger: A hostile character takes any action in line of sight.

name: METAFOLD SHOVE
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a hostile character within Range 5. On a hit, this character swaps the positions of the target with one of this character's allies within line of sight, both teleporting. Flying characters can't be swapped with characters that aren't flying and vice versa. If either teleport would not be legal for any reason, both fail.

name: MULTIPLICITY
effect: This character may create multiple duplicates of a target, interfering with targeting subroutines. As a quick action, this character may give an allied character within Sensors a Multiplicity Mark. As a reaction to being hit by a ranged or melee attack, that character may expend their Multiplicity Mark to gain immunity to that attack and teleport up to 5 spaces in any direction. They cannot take this reaction while Slowed or Immobilized and must teleport at least 1 space.

name: ABJURE
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a target within Sensors. On a hit, the target treats this character and the target of its Investiture as Invisible until the end of its next turn.

name: HARDENED TARGET
effect: This character gains +1 ACC on Systems saves, and tech attacks against them receive +1 DIFF

name: INVESTITURE
effect: This character targets an allied character within range 5. As long as they remain linked and within range 5, the target gets +1 ACC on all attacks and can allow the priest to make Systems saves and checks for them instead of using their own. If either character becomes Jammed, Impaired, or Stunned, the other linked character receives the same condition. This condition is cleared when the original condition is cleared or when the link is broken. This link ends if either character is destroyed or is more than 5 spaces from the other, and this character can only be linked with one character at a time.

name: DISPERSAL SHIELD
effect: This character or an allied character within Sensors gains Resistance to damage and heat from the next 1d3 attacks that hit it. This effect cannot stack (any additional charges provided by subsequent Dispersal Shields will replace previous charges)

name: GREATER INVESTITURE
effect: Investiture gives its target Resistance to all damage, but this character is Immobilized while linked.

name: EMPOWERED SHIELD
effect: Dispersal Shield also grants 5 Overshield.

name: SANCTUARY
effect: This character chooses an allied character within Sensors to grant Sanctuary. Before attacking a character with Sanctuary, characters must first succeed on a Systems save against this character's save target or be unable to target the character with Sanctuary until the start of their next turn. Additionally, on a failure, the character may choose to refund the cost of their action instead of taking it normally. Only one character may be under the effects of Sanctuary at a time.

name: DEATH BEFORE SURRENDER
effect: The target immediately suffers a Reactor Meltdown instead. All players are alerted to this reaction when Investiture is applied to any target.
trigger: A character under the effects of Investiture would be destroyed.

name: FLAMETHROWER
effect: This weapon deals double Burn to characters that already have any Burn.

name: EXPLOSIVE VENT
effect: This character clears all heat. Characters in a Burst 1 must succeed on an Agility save or be knocked back knocked Prone and take heat equal to half the amount this character cleared.

name: INSULATED
effect: This character has Immunity to Burn.

name: FIREBREAK SHIELD
effect: At the end of this character's turn, if they did not move, they may deploy a Burst 2 of soft cover that lasts until the start of their next turn or until they move or are Stunned. Characters are treated as Invisible against any attack that is affected by this cover.

name: UNSHIELDED REACTOR
effect: Characters that start their turn adjacent to this character or become adjacent to it for the first time on their turn take 2 Heat.

name: SUPERHOT
effect: This character gains Resistance to the attack's damage, and the attacker must succeed on an Engineering save or take 2 Burn.
trigger: This character takes damage from a melee attack.

name: HELLBIRD TRANSFORMATION
effect: This character transforms into its Mobile Form. While in this form, its speed increased by 2 and it loses all armor. It may switch back to its original form as a Quick Action, losing this speed and regaining its armor.

name: DELAYED BLASTS
effect: This character chooses 3 free spaces within line of sight and range 20 that are not adjacent to each other. The next time a character moves through or passes above one of the chosen spaces, they take 5 Explosive damage. Each space can only be triggered once and lasts until the end of this character's next turn or until it is destroyed.

name: HUNTSMAN
effect: When consuming Lock On, this character's weapons gain Smart, Seeking, and Armor-Piercing

name: HADES MISSILES
effect: This character chooses a free Blast 1 area within line of sight and range 20. That area becomes Dangerous Terrain dealing Burn until the end of the scene.

name: HOUND MISSILES
effect: Size 1/2, HP 10, Evasion 10, E-Defense 10, This character deploys a Hound Missile in an adjacent space and picks a target within range 20 and line of sight. At the start of this character's turn, the missile flies 3 spaces toward its target, or 6 spaces if they have Lock On. It moves as directly as possible, but maneuvers around cover and terrain if needed. When it collides with a character or reaches its target, it creates a Burst 1 explosion. Characters in the affected area take 16 Energy damage or half on a successful Agility save.

name: ENDLESS RAIN
effect: This character picks 6 spaces for Delayed Blasts instead of 3.

name: REBOUND
effect: Roll a d6. On a 4+, this character gains resistance to that damage and deals 5 Variable damage of the same type as the primary damage of the initial attack to the attacker.
trigger: This character takes damage from a ranged attack.

name: CHARGED SLASH
effect: This character charges a powerful slash. The first time an adjacent hostile character takes any action or begins a movement on their turn, this character first unleashes the slash as a reaction. All adjacent characters take 9 Kinetic damage or half if they pass an Agility save.

name: SHINOBI HAZE
effect: This character gains soft cover until the start of their next turn whenever they Boost.

name: ECHO EDGE
effect: Characters damaged by this character gain a Ronin's Mark. At the start of this character's turn, it may clear all Ronin's Marks as a protocol, automatically dealing 1d6 AP Kinetic damage to all characters that have a Ronin's Mark cleared this way.

name: INSTINCT MODE
effect: Until the end of this character's next turn, the first time each turn that they are targeted by an attack, they may first use the Carbon Fiber Sword to make a single attack against a character within Range as a reaction.

name: EXTENDED BLADE
effect: This character's Carbon Fiber Sword becomes Threat 3. The first time each turn that this character performs a critical hit with it, all characters within Threat take 2 Kinetic damage, including the target.

name: FOCUS DOWN
effect: When this character hits a character with its thermal lance, it marks them with a Focus Down mark until the end of this character's next turn. If the character already has a mark, they may instead consume it to deal an additional 5 Burn, removing the mark.

name: COOLING MODULE
effect: At the start of this character's turn, they clear all heat if they haven't moved (including involuntary movement) since the start of their previous turn.

name: ABLATIVE SHIELDING
effect: This character has Resistance to Energy damage.

name: SUPERCHARGED
effect: When this character consumes a Focus Down mark as part of an attack, they may take an additional 2 Heat (self) to cause their target to become Shredded and Slowed until the end of their next turn.

name: EMERGENCY VENT
effect: When this character exceeds their Heat Cap, they generate a Burst 1 zone of soft cover until the end of their next turn, and become Invisible for as long as they remain inside it. Units with this trait cannot clear Exposed by any means.

name: MELT
effect: This character makes a ranged attack against an object, deployable, or drone within Range 10, dealing 20 AP Energy damage on a hit.

name: BLASTWAVE REVERBERATOR
effect: This characater is knocked back 2 spaces in any direction after firing this weapon.

name: MARKER RIFLE
on_hit: The target receives Lock On and loses Hidden and Invisible and cannot benefit from either status until the end of their next turn.

name: SIGHT
effect: This character ignores Hidden and Invisible for the purposes of targeting hostile characters.

name: COMPLEMENTARY TARGETING
effect: When an allied character makes an attack that consumes Lock On while adjacent to this character, their target is Shredded for the duration of the attack. If the character makes multiple attacks, only attacks that benefit from the Lock On gain this effect.

name: CLOAKING FIELD
effect: This character generates a Burst 3 cloaking field that lasts until the end of their next turn. While active, this character is Immobilized, and it and allied characters in the Burst 3 are Invisible.

name: DECOY
effect: Full Action, This character and up to one adjacent ally move up to this character's speed, but must end adjacent to each other. This movement ignores engagement and does not provoke reactions.

name: SEE THROUGH REALITY
effect: Damage from attacks benefitting from Complementary Targeting now cannot be reduced in any way.

name: THERMITE MARKER
effect: Mod, This character's Marker Rifle deals 1 Burn on hit, but cannot ever benefit from bonus damage.

name: LAY MINES
effect:
This character deploys a minefield into a free Blast 1 area centered within range 3. All characters are aware of this area. This minefield arms at the end of the current turn, and is immediately triggered when any character moves into any of its spaces for the first time. When triggered, the mines have one of the four following effects, determined when they are placed:
  • Stun Mine: Characters in the area must pass an Engineering save or become Stunned until the start of their next turn.
  • Explosive Mine: Characters in the area take 8 Explosive damage or half if they pass an Agility save.
  • Sealant Mine: Characters in the area must pass a Hull save or become Immobilized until the end of the their next turn, then Slowed until the end of their subsequent turn. If Immobilized is cleared by some other method, the target does not become Slowed.
  • Shock Mine: Characters in the area must pass a Systems save or become Jammed until the end of their next turn, then Impaired until the end of their subsequent turn. If Jammed is cleared by some other method, the target does not become Impaired.

Minefields may be disarmed by making a Systems check as a Quick Action in an adjacent space or by making any attack with a Blast, Burst, Cone, or Line template that includes at least one space of the minefield, the latter of which immediately causes the minefield to detonate.

name: SKELETON KEY
effect: This character does not trigger mines.

name: HOPPING MINES
effect: Minefields deployed with Lay Mines also trigger when a character flies up to 10 spaces above them. If they trigger this way, they do not detonate in their original location, but instead detonate in a Blast 1 centered on the triggering character.

name: TRIPWIRES
effect: This character may deploy minefields as a Line 4 instead of a Blast 1. All spaces of the area must still be free.

name: SPEED DEPLOYER
effect: Lay Mines becomes 2/turn and restrictions on duplicate actions are ignored for activating it for a second time on a turn.

name: GRAV SPIKE
effect: A character within range 5 must succeed on a Systems save or have a grav spike attack to them. This character can detonate all attached grav spikes as a protocol, causing targets to take 4 AP Explosive damage and be pulled 3 spaces in a direction chosen by this character. Affected characters may pass a Systems save as a Quick Action to remove all grav spikes.

name: DET SPIKE
effect: Up to three characters within range 5 must succeed on a Systems save or have a det spike attach to them. At the start of this character's next turn, all det spikes detonate, creating Burst 1 explosions that deal 3 Explosive damage to all affected characters. Characters can take damage from more than one spike if the affected areas overlap. When this character reloads all weapons, they regain one use of this system.

name: CHAOS MINES
effect: The type of minefield deployed by Lay Mines is instead determined when they are triggered by rolling a d4 and using the respective entry in Lay Mines.

name: EYE OF MIDNIGHT
effect: This character becomes Slowed and its Overwatch triggers when hostile characters enter or leave any space within its Threat. This effect lasts until this character deactivates it as a Quick Action.

name: IN YOUR FACE
effect: Hostile characters within Threat of any of this character's weapons make ranged attacks as though they are engaged.

name: PUNISHER AMMUNITION
effect: Characters hit by this unit's Overwatch are Slowed until the end of the current turn.

name: WRATH-LOCK
effect: The next time this character attacks with their Combat Shotgun, they attack twice instead of once.

name: IMPALER
effect: The next time this character hits with their Flying Knee, the target is Immbolized and Shredded until the end of their next turn.

name: GET BACK HERE
effect: This character may Boost after the triggering action has resolved.
trigger: A hostile character within Threat of any of this characters's weapons moves.

name: SNIPER’S MARK
effect: A character within line of sight and range 25 gains the Sniper's Mark. When attacking a character with a Sniper's Mark, this unit's Anti-Materiel Rifle instead deals 1 Structure damage instead of its normal damage. This effect is ignored if the attack is affected by cover or if the target is Prone. Characters with a Sniper's Mark may drop Prone on their turn as a Free Action. Only one character may be marked by this system at a time.

name: CLIMBER
effect: This character can climb and remain stationary on any surface without penalty, including overhanging and vertical surfaces.

name: SPICY BULLETS
effect:
This character can choose a special ammunition type before attacking with the Anti-Materiel Rifle. Attacks made with this ammunition are made at +1 DIFF, with an additional effect on a succesful attack. This character may choose one of the following:
  • Electromagnetic: Targets become Jammed until the end of their next turn unless they pass a Systems save.
  • Flare: Targets lose Invisible and Hide and cannot gain either status until the end of their next turn.
  • Impact: Targets are knocked Prone unless they pass a Hull save.
  • Molten: Targets become Shredded until the end of their next turn unless they pass an Engineering save.

name: DEFENSIVE GRAPPLE
effect: This character may grapple to a point within 5 spaces, flying to their destination. Unlike normal flight, this movement does not ignore obstructions, but must still be in a straight line. If this movement is interrupted (such as from an Overwatch), it immediately ends and this character begins falling if they are not on solid ground. Additionally, this character gains the following Reaction: 1/round, Trigger: An enemy ends a movement within 5 spaces of this unit. Effect: This character may use Defensive Grapple.

name: SHROUD CHARGE
effect: This character creates a Burst 3 area of smoke, haze, or some other kind of concealing shroud. This character gains soft cover within the affected area, and characters other than it cannot draw line of sight into or out of the area. Characters partially within the area are unaffected. This effect lasts until the end of this unit's next turn, or until it uses this system again.

name: SMOOTH LOADER
effect: Protocol, If this character did not move (including involuntary movement) since the beginning of its last turn, it may reload its Anti-Materiel Rifle.

name: DEADMETAL ROUNDS
effect: This character loads the Anti-Materiel Rifle with a special, over-penetrating round. The next attack they make with it becomes Line 20 and gains Arcing. If this character does not have line of sight to a character targeted by this attack, it treats that character as Invisible for the attack and the target gains resistance to any resulting damage.

name: TACTICAL CLOAK
effect: At the start of its turn, this character becomes Invisible. It loses Invisibility until the beginning of its next turn if it is ever within 3 spaces of any allied characters.

name: HUNT
effect: This unit's melee weapon attacks deal +5 damage to characters with no allies within 3 spaces of them.

name: STALK
effect: This character marks a hostile character within line of sight. For as long as that character is marked, this character may teleport to a free space within 5 of the target as a protocol. This character may only have one character marked this way with any new marks replacing previous ones.

name: WHAT WAS THAT?
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a hit, the target's standard movement on their next turn cannot take them further away from this unit. Other sources of movement are unaffected.

name: MUST'VE BEEN THE WIND
effect: While this character is Hidden, it is also Intangible. If it makes an attack, it first loses Intangible before resolving the attack, regaining this status only if it becomes Hidden again.

name: WEAKNESS ANALYZER
effect: When this character starts its turn Hidden, their next attack made this turn while Hidden gains +1 ACC and +1d6 Kinetic damage.

name: SEALANT GUN
effect:
This character targets a character within range 5 and line of sight:
  • Allied: The target clears all Burn, but becomes Slowed until the end of their next turn.
  • Hostile: The target is Slowed unless they pass an Agility save. A Burst 1 area around the target becomes difficult terrain until the end of the scene.

name: RESTOCK DRONE
effect: Restock Drone (Size 0.5, 5 HP, 10 Evasion, 10 E-Def) This drone can be deployed hovering to a free space within range 5. The next time an allied character moves through or next to the drone, it clamps on and discharges its reserves, letting that ally regain 5 HP and destroying the drone. If the target's HP would go over its maximum, it gains the difference as Overshield.

name: NANO-REPAIR CLOUD
effect: While adjacent to this unit, allies roll twice on all saves and mech skill checks and choose either result.

name: RIDEABLE CHASSIS
effect: This character places a smaller, adjacent, allied character onto its back. The ally shares this unit's space, mirrors this unit's movement (this movement does not provoke reactions), and the ally may end this effect by moving off of the chassis as part of any movement, placing themselves in an adjacent space first. If either character is knocked Prone, Stunned, Immobilized, or destroyed, the rider lands Prone in an adjacent space, ending the effect.

name: EMPOWERED CLOUD
effect: When they start their turn adjacent to the Support, allied characters may clear one condition.

name: REMOTE CLOUD
effect: Full Action, This character releases a Blast 2 nanite cloud within range 5. Allied characters that start their turn in the area or move into it for the first time on their turn regain 2 HP. This cloud lasts until the beginning of this unit's next turn.

name: ENERGY TETHER
effect: If this weapon is used to target an ally, it automatically hits, and, instead of dealing any damage, creates a tethered link to that character, causing them to gain 3 overshield. At the start of this unit's turn, that character gains another 3 overshield (this overshield does not stack). If the target is no longer within range 10 or line of sight at the end of any turn, the tether is broken.

name: SURGERY SUITE
on_hit: The target clears one Condition or Status, or ends the effect of a tech action on the target of the Support's choice. This effect always applies after damage and the Support must always choose an option if able.

name: SMG
effect: This weapon does not suffer Difficulty from being fired while this character is Engaged.

name: FLANKER
effect: During its turn, this character gains +1 ACC on all attacks made against characters who treated this character as Invisible at the beginning of its turn or who did not have line of sight to it at the beginning of its turn.

name: THUNDERBOLT JUMPJETS
effect: This character can fly when it Boosts, but must end its turn standing on a surface or it will fall. If it provokes attacks from reactions while Boosting, those attacks suffer +1 DIFF

name: VERY ACTIVE CAMO
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a hit, the target treats this character as Invisible until the start of this character's next turn. This effect can trigger the Flanker trait.

name: HARPY TURBOJETS
effect: When this character Boosts, it may use this system to double its speed for that boost.

name: FULL-SPECTRUM OVERLOAD
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a hit, the target takes 2 heat and loses the ability to make reactions until the end of its next turn.

name: REFLEX HEAVY PISTOL SYSTEM
effect: When this character Skirmishes with its SMG, it can also make an attack with this weapon.

name: SWAP KIT
effect: This character swaps its active kit, changing its available systems, weapons, etc. Each kit has a bonus effect that triggers when it is swapped to. When one of this character's weapons or systems are destroyed, it must choose from its active kit. This character cannot use options from multiple kits during a turn. This character starts combat with an active kit of its choice but only gains the Kit Swap Bonus when it takes this action.

name: MARKSMAN KIT SWAP BONUS
effect: When this character swaps to the Marksman kit, it may reload its Ranger Long Rifle and Boost as a free action. It cannot take this free action while Slowed or Immobilized.

name: DUCK AND WEAVE (SKIRMISHER)
effect: The attack automatically misses.
trigger: This character is hit by an attack originating within 8 spaces.

name: SKIRMISHER KIT SWAP BONUS
effect: When this character swaps to the Skirmisher kit, it regains one use of Duck and Weave and reloads its Explosive Rifle as a free action and ignores difficult terrain and engagement and doesn't provoke reactions until the end of this turn.

name: RANGER LONG RIFLE (MARKSMAN)
on_hit: This weapon deals 9 Kinetic damage instead if its target is further than range 8.

name: SIEGE KIT SWAP BONUS
effect: When this character swaps to this kit, it reloads its Shoulder Mortar, and the next attack it makes with the Shoulder Mortar this turn causes the attack area to become Difficult Terrain for the rest of the scene.

name: SIEGE ARMOR (SIEGE)
effect: This character has Resistance to damage and heat from ranged attacks originating beyond Range 3.

name: SAPPER KIT SWAP BONUS
effect: When this character swaps to this kit, it may launch a flash grenade at a character within line of sight and range 5 as a free action. The target must pass an Agility save or be able to draw line of sight to only adjacent spaces until the end of its next turn.

name: JAMMING PYLONS (SAPPER)
effect: JAMMING PYLON (Size 1, 5 HP, 5 Evasion, 5 E-Def) This pylon generates a Burst 2 zone of static. All characters within the affected area are Jammed until they are no longer in the zone. Pylons remain active even if this character swaps kits, but are deactivated if this character is destroyed.

name: SAPPER KIT SWAP BONUS
effect: When this character swaps to this kit, they may boost as a free action.

name: ANNIHILATION (NIHIL)
effect: This system automatically activates at the start of any of this character's turns or when it is destroyed. This character immediately self-destructs as per Reactor Meltdown.

name: SWEET SPOT
effect: This character's weapon attacks deal 3 bonus Burn damage against targets at maximum range (AoE weapons treat the greatest of their listed values as their maximum range, e.g. Range 10 Blast 2 would be at benefit at Range 10, but a Cone 5 would benefit at Range 5).

name: FUGUE STATE
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a hit, the target expends its reaction to move its Speed in a direction of this character's choice. The target may ignore this effect, but take 3 Heat and becomes Slowed and unable to take reactions until the end of their next turn.

name: BLUR
effect: This character is Invisible during their turn.

name: RADIATIVE THANATOCODE
effect: When this character is destroyed, it creats a Burst 2 area centered around itself that persists until the end of the scene. This area is treated as Dangerous Terrain that deals Heat instead of damage.

name: HEAT SPIKE
effect: This weapon cannot deal bonus damage.

name: TEAR DOWN
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a character in Sensors. On a hit, the target's reactor is cursed, represented by a d6 starting at 1, and increasing by 1 each time the target takes heat from any source, up to a maximum of 6; if the target already has this curse from any source, they instead take 1 heat. At the end of each of the target's turns, they take heat equal to the value of the curse d6. This effect ends if the target's heat is reduced to 0 by any effect or if this character is destroyed.

name: SPREAD SUFFERING
effect: 1/round when this character uses a Quick tech or Full tech, they can repeat the option they chose as a free action targeting any character adjacent to the original target. The new target must still be a valid target for this action (e.g. Line of Sight, Sensors, etc).

name: INDUCTIVE TALONS
effect: This weapon deals +4 bonus damage against Exposed targets.

name: BLIND
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a hit, the target can only draw line of sight to adjacent spaces until the end of their next turn.

name: PREDATORY LOGIC
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a character in Sensors. On a hit, the target uses its reaction to use a non-Superheavy, non-Ordnance weapon chosen by this character to attack a valid character of this character's choice.

name: CHAIN
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a hit, the target's space is marked until the end of their next turn, at which point this effect ends. If they move further than 4 spaces away from that space before then, they become Jammed until the end of their next turn.

name: PETRIFY
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a hit, the target becomes Slowed until the of the their next turn. At the start of their next turn, if they are still Slowed, they become Immbolized until the end of their next turn. On their following turn, if they are still Immobilized, they also become Stunned until the end of the current turn.

name: PAIN TRANSFERENCE
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a hit, the target is infected with a contagious virus until the end of the scene or until they pass a Systems save as a Quick Action. While affected this way any time the target takes heat, all allied characters within Range 5 take half that amount of heat as well.

name: PARALYTIC ENGRAM
effect: This character makes a tech attack against a character in Sensors. On a hit, the target is Immobilized until the end of their next turn. When the target clears Immobilized by any means, they must pass a Systems save or become Impaired and Slowed until the end of their next turn.

name: AMYGDALA SPIKE
effect: All hostile characters within a Burst 2 area must pass a Systems save or immediately use their reaction to move a distance equal to their Speed as far away from this character as possible. This movement provokes reactions.

name: ARMORED
effect: +1–2 Armor

name: SOLDIERS
effect: The Squad acts as one character, but it represents a group of soldiers acting together. When the Squad takes a certain amount of damage, it results in the narrative death of one or more of those soldiers. Eventually, this reduces the number of attacks the Squad can make each turn, as listed in the relevant weapon profiles. By default, the Squad is made up of 10 members, each with 1 HP.

name: RANK AND FILE
effect: The Squad can’t take the Grunt, Veteran, or Ultra templates, and can never gain Structure.

name: STRENGTH IN NUMBERS
effect: The Squad has Resistance to all damage from attacks that aren’t line, Cone, Burst or Blast , and is Immune to Grapple, Ram, Knockback, and Stunned.

name: SPREAD OUT
effect: Instead of tracking the position of individual soldiers, the Squad’s members are assumed to move freely within the space it occupies. Other characters can freely move through and end their turn in spaces occupied by the Squad, and as long as the Squad occupies at least 2 free spaces it can end its turn overlapping obstructions, cover, or other characters. As its size doesn’t reflect its mass, the Squad cannot Grapple or Ram.

name: UNDERSIZE
effect: Individual soldiers can easily duck behind cover, but the sheer force of mech-scale weapons limits how effectively they can be shielded. The squad always has soft cover, even in the open, but can’t benefit from hard cover.

name: PRIMARY WEAPON
effect: This weapon can make two attacks at a time; if the Squad loses more than half its HP, it can only make one attack at a time.

name: ARMORED
effect: The Squad gains +1 Armor.

name: AMBUSHERS
effect: The Squad gains +2 Accuracy on all attacks, saves, and checks during the first round of combat.

name: DUCK AND COVER
effect: The Squad gains Resistance to the damage but becomes Immobilized until the end of their next turn.
trigger: The Squad is hit by an attack.

name: RAPID INSERTION
effect: The Squad may fly whenever it moves or Boosts.

name: DISCIPLINED
effect: Losing HP doesn’t affect the number of attacks the Squad can make each turn.

name: UNIQUE PHYSIOLOGY
effect:
If the Monstrosity has Structure (because it is an Elite or Ultra, for example), it rolls on the Monstrosity Structure Damage table when it takes structure damage.
Monstrosity Structure Damage Table
  • 5-6: Glancing Hit. The Monstrosity flinches in pain; it’s Impaired until the end of its next turn.
  • 3-4: Powerful Hit. The Monstrosity is knocked Prone by the force of the blow.
  • 2: Dismemberment. The attack blows a limb or chunk off the Monstrosity; it takes 1d6 Kinetic damage and becomes Slowed for the rest of the scene.
  • 1: Direct Hit. The result depends on the Monstrosity’s remaining Structure:
    • 3+ Structure: The Monstrosity is smacked in the head and Stunned until the end of its next turn.
    • 2 Structure: The Monstrosity must succeed on a Hull save or be destroyed.
    • 1 Structure: The Monstrosity is destroyed.
  • Multiple 1s: Fatal Hit. The Monstrosity is destroyed.

name: DEADLIEST GAME
effect: The Monstrosity has at least one optional mutation.

name: ACID SPITTLE
on_hit: Target is Shredded until the end of its next turn.

name: ADHESIVE SECRETIONS
effect: The first character damaged by the Monstrosity each turn must succeed on an Engineering save or become Slowed. This effect lasts until the target regains any HP, or for the rest of the scene.

name: BURROWER
effect: The Monstrosity burrows into the ground, as long as the surface is sufficiently malleable. While burrowed, it counts as Invisible, and can freely move through spaces occupied by characters and other obstructions; however, it can only move, Boost, or emerge into a free space (as a quick action). When the Monstrosity emerges, all characters adjacent to it must succeed on a Hull save or be knocked Prone.

name: CORROSIVE BITE
effect: A character adjacent to the Monstrosity must succeed on a Hull save or take {4/5/6} Burn. Succeed or fail, they become Shredded until they regain any HP.

name: GRASPING CLAWS
effect: The Monstrosity gains +1 Accuracy to Grapple, +1 Accuracy when attacking targets Grappled by it, and gains the ability to Boost and take reactions while grappling.

name: NATURAL CAMOUFLAGE
effect: The Monstrosity is Invisible while adjacent to any terrain or cover, and treats soft cover as hard cover.

name: RAMPAGE
effect: The Monstrosity moves spaces equal to Speed in a straight line, ignoring reactions and engagement and moving freely through spaces occupied by other characters. Characters it passes through or adjacent to must succeed on an Agility save or take {4/6/8} kinetic damage.

name: REGENERATOR
effect: At the end of its turn, the Monstrosity regains 1/4 of its total HP. It doesn’t regain any HP if it has taken Energy damage during the same round.

name: SPINED
effect: After the Monstrosity takes damage from a melee weapon, it automatically deals {1/2/3} AP kinetic damage to the attacker.

name: SWIFT
effect: Once per round, the Monstrosity can Boost during its turn as a free action.

name: TEMPERED HIDE
effect: The Monstrosity gains Resistance to any two of the following damage types: kinetic damage, Energy damage, and Explosive damage. If it is reduced to half of its total HP or less, it loses this Resistance. If it has any Structure, it regains Resistance when its HP returns to full.

name: WINGED
effect: The Monstrosity may fly whenever it moves, and doesn’t need to land at the end of movements.

name: REINFORCED
effect: The Commander gains +1 Structure and +1 Stress.

name: VOICE OF AUTHORITY
effect: The ally can reroll it.
trigger: An allied character fails an attack, check or save, and the Commander isn’t Jammed.

name: COMMANDER TRAITS
effect: The Commander chooses one option from the Commander Traits list. It doesn’t function if the Commander is Jammed.

name: BOLSTER NETWORK
effect: All allied characters within line of sight (excluding the Commander) gain +1 Accuracy on Systems saves, and tech attacks made against them receive +1 Difficulty.

name: PRESS THE ATTACK
effect: The Commander can attack the target, and deals half damage, heat or Burn if successful.
trigger: A target damages an allied character.

name: PRESS ON!
effect: The Commander clears either the Stunned condition or the Jammed condition currently affecting an allied character within line of sight.

name: QUICK MARCH
effect: One allied character within line of sight of the Commander may Boost.

name: MILITARY DISCIPLINE
effect: Allied characters adjacent to the Commander gain +1 Accuracy on all attacks, saves and checks.

name: BONUS HP
effect: The RPV gains +5 HP – it can ignore damage that would blow through the cockpit and kill a human.

name: NO PILOT
effect: The RPV has Immunity to any systems or actions that affect a pilot directly; however, it is also permanently Impaired, unable to make complex decisions or moral judgments.

name: VULNERABLE TO TECH
effect: Hostile tech actions against the RPV gain +1 Accuracy.

name: REINFORCED
effect: The Elite gains +1 Structure and +1 Stress.

name: READY AND WAITING
effect: The Elite takes two separate turns each round.

name: CAREER SOLDIER
effect: The Elite can’t take the Grunt or Ultra templates.

name: SPECIALIST KIT
effect: The Elite chooses an additional optional system from their class.

name: XENOTECH
effect: Scan doesn’t reveal any information about Exotic Systems.

name: HARDENED TARGET
effect: The Exotic gains +1 Accuracy on Systems saves, and tech attacks against them receive +1 Difficulty.

name: EXOTIC SYSTEMS
effect: The Exotic chooses up to two options from the Exotic Systems and Traits list.

name: LIVING CHASSIS
effect: This trait can only be chosen if the Exotic is a Mech. The Exotic becomes Biological.

name: BLINKSPACE CARVER
effect: The Exotic teleports when they move.

name: REALSPACE EXTRUSION
effect: This Exotic is actually an extrusion of a higher-concept entity from non-physical space, and only partially corporeal. The Exotic gains Resistance to all damage; however, they only deal half damage and other characters can freely pass through and end turns in spaces they occupy as though they aren’t there.

name: LIVING WEAPONRY
effect: The Exotic gains Immunity to Jammed. Additionally, their weapons have biotechnical and semi-organic components that spontaneously generate ammunition. When the Exotic reloads Loading weapons, they also regain 1d6 HP.

name: PARACAUSAL WEAPON
effect: Choose one of the Exotic’s weapons. Damage from that weapon can’t be reduced in any way – by Armor, Resistance, or otherwise.

name: CHRONOTORUS
effect: The Exotic causes localized distortions in the flow of time. They may either reroll 1d20 or force another character in line of sight to reroll 1d20 as a reaction. The new result must be kept.
trigger: The Exotic or another character within line of sight rolls a d20.

name: REGENERATOR
effect: At the end of the Exotic’s turn, they regain 1/4 of their total HP. They don’t regain any HP if they have taken Energy damage during the same round.

name: CHAFF
effect: The Grunt has 1 HP and can’t gain more. Unlike other characters, they never take damage when they succeed on a save – regardless of the weapon or system used – but otherwise take damage normally.

name: WEAK
effect: The Grunt can never have more than 1 Structure and 1 Stress, and they are immediately destroyed when they take heat from any source other than their own systems and weapons.

name: RANK AND FILE
effect: The Grunt can’t take the Veteran, Squad, Elite, or Ultra templates.

name: OPPORTUNIST
effect: The Mercenary gains +1 Accuracy on attacks when their target is Engaged by an allied character.

name: MERCENARY SYSTEMS AND TRAITS
effect: When choosing optional systems, the Mercenary can also choose from the Mercenary Systems and Traits list.

name: BOUNTY HUNTER
effect: Before combat begins, the GM chooses a PC: they have a bounty on their head. Any Mercenaries in the combat gain +1 Accuracy on all attacks, checks, and saves against that character – pilot and mech.

name: EFFICIENT KILLER
effect: The Mercenary gains +1 Accuracy and AP on attacks against characters with 2 Structure or less.

name: FAVORS OWED
effect: The Mercenary calls in a favor: an orbital or artillery bombardment, targeting a Blast 2 area within line of sight and range 30. Characters within the affected area must succeed on an Agility save or take {6/8/12} Explosive damage and be knocked Prone. On a success, they take half damage and aren’t knocked Prone.

name: SCOUT DRONE
effect:
Scout Drone (Size 1/2, HP 10, Evasion 10, E-Defense 10, Tags: Drone).
The Mercenary deploys the drone to a free space within Sensors. The drone creates a Burst 2 perimeter, within which characters cannot become Invisible or Hide and lose those conditions if they have them. The Mercenary also gains +1 Accuracy when attacking characters within the affected area. The drone can be deployed to a new location as a protocol.

name: LAST WORD
effect: Characters in Burst 1 must pass an Agility save or take 2 kinetic damage and become Jammed until the end of their next turn. The Mercenary then moves spaces equal to Speed in any direction. This movement ignores engagement and doesn’t provoke reactions.
trigger: The Mercenary is reduced to less than half their total HP.

name: DEADLY
effect: The Pirate deals +1d6 bonus damage on critical hits.

name: PIRATE SYSTEMS AND TRAITS
effect: When choosing optional systems, the Pirate can also choose from the Pirate Systems and Traits list.

name: BOARDING LEASH
on_hit: Target must pass a Hull save or be pulled directly to the Pirate and automatically Grappled.

name: SPLINTER ROUNDS
effect: The Pirate deals +3 bonus damage on critical hits.

name: COREWORM ROCKETS
effect:
1d3 miniature drones attach themselves to a character within line of sight and Range 10 and begin drilling into their target’s cockpit. In 1d3+2 rounds, if any coreworms are still attached, they reach the cockpit and savage the pilot, reducing them to 0 HP. The target knows how many rounds it will take for the drones to bore though, and how many are attached.
The target and allied characters adjacent to them can remove one drone at a time with a successful Systems or Engineering check as a quick action. Additionally, if the target is Shut Down, the coreworms are confused and their timer pauses.

name: PRYING CLAWS
effect: The Pirate attempts to pry open the cockpit of a character adjacent to them. The target must succeed on a Hull save or the pilot is forced to immediately exit their mech as though Dismounting.

name: SLAVER SIGNAL
effect: A piloted mech or vehicle within Range 10 must make a Systems save. On a failure, all pilots and other Biological characters inside the target are overcome by the signal, becoming Stunned. Unless their mech or vehicle has an AI, it also becomes Stunned. If any affected characters (or their mech or vehicle) take damage, they are jolted awake – ending the effect. Characters adjacent to the target can also end the effect by blotting out the signal with a successful Systems check as a full action. Otherwise, the effect lasts until the Pirate is destroyed.

name: FLIER
effect: The Ship moves normally in zero-g environments. In-atmosphere, it hovers. It gains Immunity to Immobilized, Stunned and Prone.

name: MASSIVE SIZE
effect: The Ship is Size 4. Though it is larger than most mechs, it is small by ship standards; larger ships are too heavily armored to be damaged by mech-scale weapons.

name: CREW
effect: The Ship has at least two crewmembers.

name: ARMORED HULL
effect: The Ship gains +5 HP.

name: NO MANIPULATORS
effect: The Ship can’t pick up objects, manipulate objects or the environment, or Grapple.

name: LIMITED MELEE ATTACKS
effect: The Ship can’t make melee attacks other than Ram.

name: TRANSPORT
effect: The Ship can transport one Squad or characters whose combined Size is less than its own Size.

name: MANEUVERABLE
effect: The Spacer moves normally in zero-g environments.

name: SPACER SYSTEMS
effect: When choosing optional systems, the Spacer can also choose from the Spacer Systems list.

name: GRAVITY RIFLE
on_hit: Targets must pass a Hull save or be pulled in a straight line towards the Spacer, up to 10 spaces or until they hit an obstruction. If they collide with an obstruction, they are additionally knocked Prone.

name: SEALANT TRAP
effect: When a hostile character moves adjacent to the mine, characters within a Burst 1 area are covered with a spray of thick, fast-drying sealant and become Immobilized. They remain stuck until the sealant takes sufficient damage to break; it counts as having {5/10/15} HP and Evasion 5.

name: THUMPER GRENADES
effect:
The Spacer expends a charge for the following effect:
Thumper grenade (Grenade, range 5, Blast 1): Characters in the affected area must pass an Agility check or be knocked 3 spaces back, directly away from the center of the explosion. If this causes them to collide with an obstruction, they are also knocked Prone.

name: BEST OF THE BEST
effect: The Ultra can’t take the Elite or Grunt templates.

name: SHOCK AND AWE
effect:
The Ultra takes two separate turns each round. They regain spent reactions each time they take a turn.
If the Ultra is facing five or more hostile characters when combat begins, the Ultra takes a third turn each round.

name: DEADLY
effect: The Ultra deals +1d6 damage on critical hits.

name: JUGGERNAUT
effect: At the start of the Ultra’s turn, they clear one condition. At the end of their turn, they repair one destroyed weapon or system.

name: REINFORCED
effect: The Ultra gains +3 Structure and +3 Stress.

name: LEGENDARY
effect: The Ultra rolls all structure damage and overheating checks twice and chooses either result.

name: ADVANCED KIT
effect: The Ultra chooses 1–2 additional optional systems from their class.

name: RESILIENT
effect: The Ultra gains +5 HP.

name: REFLEX
effect: The Ultra can Overwatch unlimited times per round.

name: ULTRA SYSTEMS AND TRAITS
effect: The Ultra chooses 1–3 options from the Ultra Systems and Traits list.

name: HOVER PROPULSION
effect: The Ultra can hover when they move or Boost.

name: REPULSION FIELD
effect: When hostile characters start their turn adjacent to the Ultra or become adjacent to the Ultra for the first time on their turn, they take {2/4/6} Energy damage + 2 heat and must succeed on a Systems save or become Impaired until the end of their next turn.

name: SIEGE SHIELD
effect: The Ultra gains Resistance to all damage from attacks that originate beyond range 3.

name: SLIVERSHIELDING
effect: This system replaces Resilient. The Ultra becomes permanently Invisible.

name: SHORT-CYCLE LANCE
effect: Draw a line 30 path: characters within the affected area must succeed on an Agility save or take 1 structure damage. On a success, they are reduced to 1 HP. Objects smaller than Size 5 are completely annihilated.

name: VOLLEY MODULE
effect:
The Ultra adopts a stable stance and prepares one of their weapons. On their next turn, as a protocol, the Ultra uses the prepared weapon to attack any number of characters, as long as they are within Range, and aren’t in cover or Prone. All characters are aware of this attack and can choose to drop Prone as a free action on their turn to avoid being targeted.
The Ultra can attack unlimited times with the prepared weapon as part of this effect, even if it’s Loading.

name: WOLFHOUND MISSILE
effect:
Wolfhound Missile (Size 1, HP {10/15/20}, Evasion 10, E-Defense 10, Tags: Drone)
The Ultra chooses a character within line of sight and range 30, then deploys the wolfhound missile to an adjacent space. At the start of each of the Ultra’s subsequent turns, the missile flies 3 spaces towards the target, or 6 spaces if the target has Lock On. The missile moves as directly as possible, but maneuvers around cover and obstructions as long as there is space to do so. When the missile collides with a character or reaches the target, it detonates with a Blast 1 explosion. Characters within the affected area must make an Agility save. On fail, they take {14/20/28} Energy damage; on a success, they take half damage.
The Ultra can only deploy one wolfhound missile at a time, and this system can only recharge once the missile has detonated.

name: ARGUS ARMOR
effect: The Ultra has 6 Armor. Each time they roll a structure damage or overheating check, they lose 2 Armor, to a minimum of 0.

name: DEVASTATOR
effect: 1/round, when the Ultra makes a successful attack, all characters within line of sight take {2/4/6} kinetic, Explosive, or Energy damage.

name: EVASIVE
effect: The Ultra gains +4 Evasion (to a maximum of 20) and –1 Structure.

name: EXTRA DEADLY
effect: The first critical hit the Ultra performs each turn deals +2d6 damage at Tier 2 or +3d6 damage at Tier 3.

name: FORTRESS
effect: The Ultra gains +3 Accuracy on Systems saves, and tech attacks against them receive +3 difficulty.

name: LEAD THE CHARGE
effect: The Ultra can Boost. This reaction can be used any number of times a round.
trigger: A hostile character in line of sight moves.

name: LEGION
effect: The Ultra gains +4 E-Defense (to a maximum of 20) and +1 Accuracy on all tech attacks.

name: LIMITLESS
effect: The Ultra can Overcharge. Instead of the standard cost, they always gain 1d6 heat.

name: SIGHT
effect: The Ultra ignores Invisible, and hostile characters within Sensors can’t Hide.

name: SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION
effect: This trait replaces Resilient. The Ultra gains Resistance to one damage type – kinetic damage, Energy damage, or Explosive damage. They can’t gain permanent Resistance to more than two damage types, whether from this or any other system.

name: SUPERIOR FRAME
